Content.Text:
Today is Allen's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everything looks pretty good. Did
you make this banquet just for me？
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, we should eat before it gets
cold. Here I go.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was great. Everything was just
perfect, my princess. You deserve a
prize.
He seems very happy. What to say?
I'll gladly do anything for you.
I worked really hard to make this.
I love you.
You don't have to thank me.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You're so cute, it makes me want
to grab you and hug you.
<PAGE>
Obviously, I'd gladly do anything
for you, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I can tell how much work you had
with just one look. That's why
I'm expressing my gratitude.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry it was so much work, but
you don't have to tell me. You've
totally ruined the mood.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hearing these words from you and seeing
that spectacular smile on your face,
I feel really blessed tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm deeply in love with you, my
princess. Forever and ever.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You could have just said "you're
welcome," you know. You just ruined my
mood for the night.

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Oh no, I ended up making him angry.
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

I'm glad we could celebrate like this.
Happy birthday, Allen, my love. May
we be together forever.

Oh no, I disappointed him...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Rod's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, wow! I wasn't expecting such a
treat!
<PAGE>
You made all this because of my
birthday? Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, what are we waiting for? Let's
eat!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aw, man, it was so tasty! I ate so much,
I can't even think of food anymore!
I really enjoyed everything.
He seems very happy. What should I say?
I'm so glad you liked it.
What will I get for my birthday?
Thank you for everything.
Don't I deserve something in return?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yeah. I'm really, really happy, too.
In fact, I was so deeply moved that
I might start crying.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you so much! I'll never
forget this day.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
When you say it like that, I feel so
pressured now. Man, what am I
supposed to do now?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I'm so proud to have you as my
wife.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I've always loved
you, but now I love you even more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Something in return? This is a joke,
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If it is not, then I'm really shocked.
To think that you had ulterior
motives right from the start...

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Oh no, now he's worrying about it. I
shouldn't have said those things.

I'm glad we could celebrate like this.
Happy birthday, Rod, my love. May we be
together forever.

Oh no, I disappointed him...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Soseki's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Impressive! I'm tickled that you went
through all this trouble for my
birthday!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come, let's eat it right away! Let's
enjoy this splendid meal.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was delicious, <MYNAME>. You must
have worked hard to put this together.
Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.
He seems very happy. What should I say?
I'm glad we could celebrate.
Ah, I'm so tired!
This is what family is about.
I just wanted to cook a nice dinner.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The perfect sentiment! I'm
truly blessed for having such a 
hard-working wife.
<PAGE>
I must put much more effort on
preparing for your birthday, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
As I thought, you must be very tired.
I appreciate your work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, you should rest now. Let me
take care of the dishes.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's so nice to have a family!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Being single has its highlights, but
this warm feeling in my heart is so
much better.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, thank you. You are the best
wife I could've ever wished for.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
... 
<PAGE>
Does that mean you hadn't planned
anything at all for my birthday?
<PAGE>
Maybe it's not that bad... I'm pretty
old to be having birthday parties...

I'm glad we could celebrate like
this. Happy birthday, Soseki, my
love. May we be together forever.

I ended up giving him more work... I
shouldn't have said those things.

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Oh no, I disappointed him...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Sanjay's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this, by chance, a celebration for
my birthday?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Everything looks scrumptious. I will
be glad to partake.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was beyond extraordinary! An amazing
succession of culinary wonders! Thank
you for celebrating my birthday with me.
He seems very happy. What should I say?
I'm so glad you liked it.
What will I get for my birthday?
Thank you for everything.
Don't I deserve something in return?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, it was so wonderful. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Having my beloved one cherish the
simple fact that I was born is one
example of true happiness.
<PAGE>
I wish we can remain together for the
rest of our lives.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Certainly I'll try my best for you, 
<MYNAME>, but I'll ask you not to
expect too much from it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I say this because it would be too
painful for me to see the disappointment
in your eyes.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I am the one who must show more 
gratitude for everything you do for me.
<PAGE>
The reason I can smile everyday is the
fact that I'm living with you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I pray that you'll stay by my side
until the last of my days.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Were you expecting some compensation
for this right from the start?
<PAGE>
Please don't say such things ever
again, even if you mean them as a
joke. It makes my heart ache.

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Now he's got such a sad look on his
face... I shouldn't have said those
things.

I'm glad we could celebrate like
this. Happy birthday, Sanjay, my
love. May we be together forever.

I ended up making him miserable... 
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Neil's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, what's the deal here? Did you
make all this? Isn't that something!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything looks great. Let's
hurry up and dig in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's food was outstanding. Thanks
a lot for remembering my birthday.
He seems very happy. What should I say?
I'll gladly do anything for you.
I worked a lot to make this.
I love you.
You don't have to thank me, honey.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You... What's wrong with you! Don't
say that embarrassing stuff all of a
sudden!
<PAGE>
Here, let me help you with the cleaning.
Since today's my birthday, we should
get this out of the way and relax.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's with your attitude?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry to have put you through all
this trouble, but it's not like I asked
you to do anything.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why do you have to keep making me
uncomfortable with those lines? Is
this also part of the celebration?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, what can I do? I love
you too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
So, is this how you respond to other
people's gratitude?
<PAGE>
Tsk, I guess I shouldn't have said
anything. How stupid of me.

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Now he's got such a sad look on his
face... I shouldn't have said those
things.

I'm glad we could celebrate like this.
Happy birthday, Neil, my love.
May we be together forever.

Oh no, I ended up making him angry...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Amir's birthday! I'm cooking
his favorite meal for this special day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's dinner is a line-up of all my
favorite foods, and it all looks
fantastic.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm grateful for this delicious meal.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight's dinner made me feel like a
king. Thank you for making my birthday
all the more special.
He seems very happy. What should I say?
I'm glad we could celebrate.
Ah, I'm so tired.
Isn't this what family is for?
I just wanted to cook a nice dinner.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My thoughts exactly! I'm also happy
that you're with me today. I'm glad 
we're in the same place about this.
<PAGE>
I hope we can celebrate like this
many more times. I'm already looking
forward to my next birthday.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I imagined you'd be tired. Thank you
for working so hard to make me happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, you don't have to care
about me so much. On my next birthday,
you just sit back and relax.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Family... I like how this word sounds.
<PAGE>
I never imagined I would have such a
calm, peaceful birthday. I used to
think this was inconceivable.
<PAGE>
Being able to start a family with
you is my biggest present, <MYNAME>.
I'm really thankful for that.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So it was just a coincidence...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Maybe I just had the wrong impression
right from the start. It's not your
fault, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
All that matters is that this made me
very happy.

I'm glad we could celebrate like
this. Happy birthday, Amir, my love.
May we be together forever.

I ended up giving him more work... I
shouldn't have said those things.

It seems he's even happier now. I'll
do this for him again next year.

Oh no, I disappointed him...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Tina's birthday! I'll cook
her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, what a great surprise! There are
so many delicious-looking things...
<PAGE>
Did you make all this just because of
my birthday? Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, what do you say we start eating
now? It'd be a pity to let it get
cold.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was so delicious! Thank you for
this lovely treat, <MYNAME>.
She looks very happy. What should I say?
I'll gladly do anything for you.
I worked hard to make this.
I love you.
No need to thank me, baby.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, look, now you made me blush! I
love you so much, <MYNAME>!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Why are you saying this again? I just
thanked you, didn't I?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you too! I'm glad I could
marry someone like you, <MYNAME>!
I'm really, truly happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Look at you, acting all cool... I'm
trying to be nice, here, so you have
to be nice, too!

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

I didn't want to make her angry. Next
time I'll think twice before saying 
cruel things. At least we're good again.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Tina, my love. I wish
we'll never be apart.

Oh no, I disappointed her...
We made up already, but I shouldn't
have said that.

Today is Michelle's birthday! I'll cook
her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ooh, I'm getting a very special dinner
tonight! Well, it is my birthday,
after all.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Can we start eating? It looks very
tasty!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Mmmm, I loved it! Thank you for
such a delicious meal, <MYNAME>.
She looks very happy. What should I say?
I'm happy you enjoyed it.
What will I get for my birthday?
Thank you for everything.
Don't I get anything in return?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, of course I am. But more
importantly, I'm happy that you 
celebrated my birthday with me.
<PAGE>
Will we do this again next year? I
surely hope so!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That was kinda rude... I wasn't
expecting to hear that on my birthday.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, I'm the one who should be saying
the thank-yous today, not you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
If you really want to thank me, then
just stay with me forever! I promise
I will.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You made me dinner just for the reward?
Was this your plan all along?
<PAGE>
I didn't know you were capable of
doing such things, <MYNAME>. I'm a
bit disappointed with you.

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

Now she's got this sad look all over
her face... I should have kept my
mouth shut.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Michelle, my love.
I hope we'll be together forever.

I didn't want to make her miserable.
I should have kept my mouth shut.
But at least we patched things up.

Today is Yuri's birthday! I'll cook
her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This looks delicious... Is it for
my birthday? I'm... so happy.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll start eating now...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I liked all the food very much...
Thanks.
She looks very happy. What should I say?
I'll gladly do anything for you.
I worked a lot to make this.
I love you.
No need to thank me, baby.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm a little embarrassed... but I'm
also very happy.
<PAGE>
I will do anything for you, too...
Because I love you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You must be so tired... I'm sorry to
keep you so long... You should rest now.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yes... I love you, too... And I
always will.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Please don't say that... Showing
appreciation is very important...

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

I didn't want to make her angry. Next
time I'll think twice before saying 
cruel things. At least we're good again.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Yuri, my love.
I hope we'll be together forever.

She was disappointed with me... I
should have kept my mouth shut. But at
least we patched things up.

Today is Iroha's birthday! I'll cook
her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, such a delightful dinner. Will
you celebrate my birthday with me? It
would be lovely.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's eat.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
The food was simply excellent. Such
a delightful banquet. 
<PAGE>
It must have been quite a lot of
work. Please accept my sincere
gratitude.

She looks very happy. What should I
say?
I'm happy you enjoyed it.
What will I get for my birthday?
Thank you for everything.
Don't I get anything in return?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, you always treat me so well.
I feel like I can never express how
thankful I am.
<PAGE>
Please let me try to convey at least
some part of my feelings today.
I'm really grateful to you, <MYNAME>

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I see.
<PAGE>
That's a lot of pressure... But I
must work hard for you, too!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I am touched by your lovely words. My
heart is deeply moved.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>! You
can't grasp how deep my 
affection is for you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I did not see those words coming. I
believe they were rather inappropriate
for this occasion.
<PAGE>
To seek a reward on someone else's
birthday is not a laudable act.
I'm a little dismayed.

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

Now she's got this sad look all over
her face... I should have kept my
mouth shut.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Iroha, my love.
I hope we'll be together forever.

I didn't want to make her angry. Next
time I'll think twice before saying 
cruel things. At least we're good again.

Today is Felicity's birthday! I'll cook
her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, so many tempting delights!
Are these all for me? They all 
look so delicious.
<PAGE>
Thank you for the wonderful treat,
my sweet <MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I loved that you made this all
for me, <MYNAME>! I can't wait
to try everything!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As a gourmand, I must say every dish
was absolutely exquisite! Thank you
so much!<RED>∀</RED>
She looks very happy. What should I say?
I'm happy you enjoyed it.
What will I get for my birthday?
Thank you for everything.
Don't I get anything in return?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Heeheehee! If it's something from
you, <MYNAME>, pumpkin, of course I'll
enjoy it!<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Today was really unique! I love
you so much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I wonder if I could even make food
this delicious...
<PAGE>
I'm really not sure... But I don't have
time to worry! I must perfect my
cooking as soon as possible...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... I'm so touched, I think
I could cry!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, my love for you is bigger
than the largest cake you could imagine!
I want to be with you forever.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, <MYNAME>, why did you have to say
that? You completely ruined my mood!

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

Now she's got this sad look all over
her face... I should have kept my
mouth shut.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Felicity, my love.
I hope we'll be together forever.

I didn't want to make her miserable. I
should have kept my mouth shut. But
at least we patched things up.

Today is the Witch Princess' birthday!
I'll  cook her favorite meal tonight.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, look, today's dinner is something
special. Is it an attempt to make this
magical day even better?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, let's see how much effort you've
put into this meal.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe you cooked such a
delicious meal just for me.
<PAGE>
My little <MYNAME>, you've really
outdone yourself. You've earned a lot
of points in my book! Thanks.
She looks very happy. What should I say?
I'm glad we could celebrate.
I'm so tired.
Isn't this what family is for?
I just wanted to cook a nice dinner.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes... I am also glad to be able
to spend my birthday with you, my
little <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you very much. I
love you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now just a minute, <MYNAME>. That
wasn't a very nice response to my
gratitude.
<PAGE>
Oh, well. I should let it go. It wasn't
that bad.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You have a point. Having a family is
a lot nicer than I thought it could
be.
<PAGE>
If I hadn't married you, my little
<MYNAME>, I would have never known.
I'm happy that we're together.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now just a minute, <MYNAME>. That
wasn't a very nice response to my
gratitude.
<PAGE>
Oh, well. I should let it go. It wasn't
that bad.

I'm glad it all went as planned.
Happy birthday, Witch Princess. I
hope we'll be together forever.

I didn't want to make her angry. Next
time I'll think twice before saying 
cruel things. At least we're good again.

She looks even happier now. I'll
definitely do this again next year.

I didn't want to make her angry. Next
time I'll think twice before saying 
cruel things. At least we're good again.
